name: 3in1 Mix It Up Module
description: Three-in-one interactive module featuring Ripple (height-field water simulation), Kaleido (kaleidoscope pattern generator), and Moiré (rotating pattern effect). Switch between modes with buttons or keyboard shortcuts (1/2/3). Press G for glow effect, R to reset.

safety.notes: Pure canvas and SVG animations. No media playback. Safe for all contexts. Ripple effect responds to pointer interaction.

controls.label: Ripple Mode
controls.description: Switch to ripple water simulation mode
